text: Gulshan Grover (born 21 September 1955) is an Indian film actor and producer. He has appeared in over 400 films. He is popularly known as the "Bad Man" of Bollywood because he has the ability to create an impact with his negative roles in films. Grover holds a post graduate degree from Delhi’s Sri Ram College of Commerce. He was associated with ‘Little Theatre Group’ for a long time before launching into the Hindi film industry. == References == == Other websites == * Gulshan Grover at IMDb Category:Indian movie actors Category:Living people Category:1955 births Category:Actors from New Delhi
title: Gulshan Grover
